title: acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop 165Hz 15.6" QHD, AMD Ryzen 7 6800H 8-Core, GeForce RTX 3070 Ti 8GB, 16GB DDR5 RAM 1TB SSD, 4-Zone RGB Backlit Keyboard, WiFi 6E, RJ45, Windows 11+ Mousepad
features: 【NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti 8GB】The latest NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti (8GB dedicated GDDR6 VRAM) is powered by award-winning architecture with new Ray Tracing Cores, Tensor Cores, and streaming multiprocessors support DirectX 12 Ultimate for the ultimate gaming performance
【AMD Ryzen 7 6800H 8-Core】Powered by High-Performance Processing - AMD 8-Core Ryzen 7 6000 Series 6800H (Octa-core, 16 Threads, base clock speed 3.2 GHz, max turbo to 4.7GHz, 16MB L3 Cache)

【15.6" QHD 165Hz Display】15.6" QHD (2560 x 1440) IPS 300nits, 100% DCI-P3, 165Hz, 16:9, 3ms Overdrive Response Time, AMD FreeSync Premium Technology display; Expandable to external monitors via HDMI, max resolution of external monitors can be 8K @60Hz

【Upgraded Storage】Professionally upgraded to 16GB DDR5 RAM, 1TB PCIe SSD. Original Seal is opened for upgrade ONLY. Configure your laptop for maximum speed and massive storage with two slots for M.2 PCIe DDR5 4800 RAM.

【Slots & Ports】1 x HDMI 2.1 with HDCP Support, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (Up to 10 Gbps), DisplayPort Over USB Type-C & USB Charging, 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A (One Featuring Power-Off Charging), 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1 x RJ-45 (1Gbps), 1 x Headphone/Microphone Combo Jack.
description: AMD Ryzen 7 6800H (Octa-core, 16 Threads, base clock speed 3.2 GHz, max turbo to 4.7GHz, 16MB L3 Cache)
15.6" QHD (2560 x 1440) IPS 300nits, 100% DCI-P3, 165Hz, 16:9, 3ms Overdrive Response Time, AMD FreeSync Premium Technology display
Dedicated NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti 8 GB GDDR6, Boost clock up to 1510MHz, TGP up to 150W
HD Webcam (1280 x 720) supporting Super High Dynamic Range (SHDR)

1 x USB Type-C port: USB 3.2 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps), DisplayPort over USB-C, USB charging 5 V; 3 A, DC-in port 20 V; 100 W 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A (One Featuring Power-off Charging) 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A 1 x HDMI 2.1 Port with HDCP Support 1 x Headphone/Microphone Combo Jack 1 x RJ-45 (1Gbps)
